Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.28443279] Gram-positive bacteria:S.aureus ATCC 33591 (MIC=6μM), Staphylococcus epidermidis (MIC=1.5μM);Gram-negative bacteria:Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-1706 (MIC=6μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC=6μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.28443279] 8% hemolysis at 48μM, 38% hemolysis at 96μM against human red cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.28443279] IC50 = 52 μM against PBMCs.IC50 = 59 μM against A549 cells
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria,antifungal activity.

Literature.Title: Analogs of the Frog-skin Antimicrobial Peptide Temporin 1Tb Exhibit a Wider Spectrum of Activity and a Stronger Antibiofilm Potential as Compared to the Parental Peptide
Literature.Author: Grassi L, Maisetta G, Maccari G, Esin S, Batoni G.

Literature.Title: Minor sequence modifications in temporin B cause drastic changes in antibacterial potency and selectivity by fundamentally altering membrane activity
Literature.Author: Manzo G, Ferguson PM, Gustilo VB, Hind CK, Clifford M, Bui TT, Drake AF, Atkinson RA, Sutton JM, Bat
